author: mgratti
body:
This PR adds the pdl files and the decay files for an MC request of an EXO analysis searching for heavy neutral leptons (HNLs) from semi-leptonic B decays (B => mu HNL X), with the HNL decaying to electron/muon and a pion.

The .pdl files are a copy of evt_2014.pdl + an additional line which defines the properties of the new HNL particle.

The branching ratios used in the .DEC files were obtained from the [paper by Bondarenko et al.](https://doi.org/10.1007/JHEP11(2018)032)

The usage of these files was tested locally by me.
title: Addition of .pdl and .DEC files for MC production of B => mu HNL X
